2164.subject: SICP
2164.descrlong: Sketch the sweeping vistas of Big Sur, tide pools of Pacific Grove, streams meandering through giant coastal redwoods, as well as historic Cannery Row.  Focus will be on learning to use quick observation & field sketching techniques while experiencing the rich ecosystems of California's central coast.  (Graphite, ink, colored pencil, watercolor).  (Credit/ No Credit Available)
